title: Banned w/out reason
body: I weant to log onto my league account after 2 months of inactivity, and it says i was banned and info was at my email, and there nothing at my email and it doesnt say why i was banned, and thats what im trying to figure out, why was i banned

replies.body: It looks like there was a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks)issued on some of the payments from this account, so you'll need to reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what happened and how you can get back onto this account.
Send a ticket to Riot Support.
